code: import{ageInfo}from"./ageInfo.js";export function calcRatio(undertwocount,twotothreecount,threepluscount){var accountedChildren=0;var underTwoTemp=undertwocount;var twoToThreeTemp=twotothreecount;var threePlusTemp=threepluscount;var numStaff=0;while(underTwoTemp){underTwoTemp--;accountedChildren++;}while(accountedChildren%ageInfo.undertwo){while(twoToThreeTemp){twoToThreeTemp--;accountedChildren++;if(!(accountedChildren%ageInfo.undertwo)){break;}}if(!(accountedChildren%ageInfo.undertwo)){break;}while(threePlusTemp){threePlusTemp--;accountedChildren++;if(!(accountedChildren%ageInfo.undertwo)){break;}}break;}numStaff=Math.ceil(accountedChildren/ageInfo.undertwo);accountedChildren=0;while(twoToThreeTemp){twoToThreeTemp--;accountedChildren++;}while(accountedChildren%ageInfo.twotothree){while(threePlusTemp){threePlusTemp--;accountedChildren++;if(!(accountedChildren%ageInfo.twotothree)){break;}}break;}numStaff+=Math.ceil(accountedChildren/ageInfo.twotothree);accountedChildren=0;while(threePlusTemp){threePlusTemp--;accountedChildren++;}numStaff+=Math.ceil(accountedChildren/ageInfo.threeplus);accountedChildren=0;return numStaff;}
